means: [人名] 坦塔罗斯（希腊神话中的人物）

sentence.Network_en: Descended from Tantalus , Agamemnon inherited the curse of the gods on the family.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为坦塔洛斯的后人,阿伽门农不得不承受众神加诸这个家族的惩罚.

sentence.Network_en: What say you to that torture of Tantalus as applied to a mother?
sentence.Network_cn: 教一个做母亲的人受那种眼睁睁的生离死别的苦痛,您觉得有什么可说的 吗 ?

means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) a wicked king and son of Zeus; condemned in Hades to stand in water that receded when he tried to drink and beneath fruit that receded when he reached for it
